QuestData.Title: Maximum Capacitor
QuestData.Description:
The mines north of here are critical to the mogu supply line. They are using giant lightning enchanted drills to extract the ore.
If you can disrupt the drills, they'll be destroyed, greatly slowing their ability to make weapons.
Oh, also, kill whoever is in charge, will you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the 3 lightning drills in the Ghost Iron Mines, and kill Metal Lord Mono-Han.
QuestData.RewardText: Time to push ahead - to the forge!
